model_answer: The answer is C: [00:05:18 - 00:06:13]. The scene described occurs from 00:05:18 to 00:06:13 in the video.

The correct answer is B: [00:07:01 - 00:07:36]. In this segment of the video, the speaker explains that in writing chemical formulas, they do not use brackets when there is only one ion present. This rule is demonstrated by emphasizing the example of sodium carbonate with the note "We don't use Bracket." The speaker then shows the chemical formula for sodium carbonate as Na2CO3.
